metadata.title: CVE-2020-24696 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PowerDNS Authoritative through 4.3.0 when--enable-experimental-gss-tsig is used. A remote, unauthenticated attackercan trigger a race condition leading to a crash, or possibly arbitrary codeexecution, by sending crafted queries with a GSS-TSIG signature.

criterions.comment: pdns package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
